H0.text: What monkey is friends with the Man in the Yellow Hat. Bongo

H1.text: What monkey is friends with the Man in the Yellow Hat. Magilla Gorilla

H2.text: What monkey is friends with the Man in the Yellow Hat. Donkey Kong

H3.text: What monkey is friends with the Man in the Yellow Hat. Curious George

A4.text: Curious George is a fictional monkey who is the title character of a series of popular children's picture books written and illustrated by Margret and H. A. Rey.

A5.text: George and the Man with the Yellow Hat become good friends.
